channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Multicloud Management Monitoring
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Multicloud Management Monitoring

item.title: CVE-2021-38941|2024-08-04T01:51:20.667Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20multicloud%20management%20monitoring
item.description: IBM CloudPak for Multicloud Monitoring 2.0 and 2.3 has a few containers running in privileged mode which is vulnerable to host information leakage or destruction if unauthorized access to these containers could execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 211048.
